title: 2 Simple Ways to Add an Extra Email Address on LinkedIn

steps.title: Log into https://www.linkedin.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Log into https://www.linkedin.com/ in a web browser. You should see your feed.

steps.title: Click Me.
steps.content: Click Me . This is in the top-right corner. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click Settings & Privacy.
steps.content: Click Settings & Privacy . You can find this in the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click Sign in & security.
steps.content: Click Sign in & security . This is in the left panel.

steps.title: Click Email addresses.
steps.content: Click Email addresses . This is the first option underneath the Account access header.

steps.title: Click Add email address.
steps.content: Click Add email address . You can find this button below your primary email address. You may be asked to verify your primary email address first. If you are, enter the 6-digit code and click Submit .

steps.title: Enter a new email address and your password.
steps.content: Enter a new email address and your password. Make sure to spell the new email address correctly; a confirmation link will be sent.

steps.title: Click Submit.
steps.content: Click Submit . This is the blue button.

steps.title: Click the confirmation link.
steps.content: Click the confirmation link. This will be sent to the new email address. Clicking it will confirm the email, and it will be added as a secondary email for your LinkedIn account. To make the new email your primary email, click Make primary next to the email. If you want to change your email , make the new email primary, and then tap Delete next to the old email.

steps.title: Open the LinkedIn app.
steps.content: Open the LinkedIn app. If you aren't already logged into your account , enter your email address and password to do so now.

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture . This is in the top-left corner.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . You can find this at the bottom of the panel.

steps.title: Tap Sign in & security.
steps.content: Tap Sign in & security . This is underneath Account preferences .

steps.title: Tap Email addresses.
steps.content: Tap Email addresses . This is the first option underneath Account access .

steps.title: Tap Add email address.
steps.content: Tap Add email address . You can find this button below your primary email address. You may be asked to verify your primary email address first. If you are, enter the 6-digit code and tap Submit .

steps.title: Enter a new email address and your password.
steps.content: Enter a new email address and your password. Make sure to spell the new email address correctly; a confirmation link will be sent.

steps.title: Tap Submit.
steps.content: Tap Submit . This is the blue button.

steps.title: Tap the confirmation link.
steps.content: Tap the confirmation link. This will be sent to the new email address. Tapping it will confirm the email, and it will be added as a secondary email for your LinkedIn account. To make the new email your primary email, tap Make primary next to the email.
